definitions.text: any piece of work that is undertaken or attempted
extend out or project in space
examples: A single rock sticks out from the cliff

definitions.text: transfer (ideas or principles) from one domain into another

examples: The images are projected onto the screen

definitions.text: make or work out a plan for; devise
examples: They contrived to murder their boss

definitions.text: present for consideration, examination, criticism, etc.
examples: He proposed a new plan for dealing with terrorism
She proposed a new theory of relativity

definitions.text: imagine; conceive of; see in one's mind
examples: I can't see him on horseback!
I can see what will happen
I can see a risk in this strategy
She threw the flashlight beam into the corner
The setting sun threw long shadows
